short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control the X-Wikimedia-Debug header on HTTP requests.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows Wikimedia developers to debug code by injecting an 'X-Wikimedia-Debug' header into HTTP requests made to Wikimedia Foundation projects.
